_comment: Ship log entries — edit this file directly in VS Code to add/modify logs. Entries are displayed in the terminal LOGS view. Each entry needs: id, timestamp, source, title, level, and detail (full body text). Level can be: '', 'warning', or 'critical'.

logs.title: CREW REVIVED FROM CRYOSLEEP
logs.detail:

logs.title: UNKNOWN SIGNAL DETECTED ON LONG-RANGE SENSORS
logs.detail:
SIGNAL TYPE: REPEATING BURST TRANSMISSION
FREQUENCY: 489.12 MHz (NON-STANDARD)
SIGNAL STRENGTH: -72 dBm
ORIGIN: BEARING 127.4 / RANGE 2.4 AU
SIGNAL DURATION: 12.7 SECONDS (REPEATING EVERY 180 SECONDS)

ANALYSIS: PATTERN DOES NOT MATCH ANY KNOWN WEYLAND-YUTANI, UPP, OR CIVILIAN BEACON PROTOCOL.

PER COMPANY STANDING ORDER ICC/WY-4720:
ALL COMMERCIAL VESSELS ARE OBLIGATED TO INVESTIGATE SIGNALS OF POSSIBLE INTELLIGENT ORIGIN.

AWAITING BRIDGE CREW AUTHORIZATION FOR COURSE CHANGE.

logs.detail:
